title: Halo drop affordable zero compromise Gravitas DH alloy wheels with 27.5mm rims
content:
Over the last two years, UK brand Halo Wheels have been developing and testing new downhill wheels with SR Suntour-Commencal Racing’s Jack Reading. The all-new Halo Gravitas is an alloy wheelset running an asymmetric 27.5mm internal width rim made from a new alloy material that is 30% stronger than their early prototypes.
